Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.model.client

Interface ClientDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientDB
public interface ClientDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for client operations. This interface defines methods for performing CRUD operations on clients in the database.
Since:
2024-05-28

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteClient(ClientDTO deletedClient)
    Deletes a client from the database.

    getClients()
    Retrieves a list of all clients from the database.

    Inserts a new client into the database.

    updateClient(ClientDTO updatedClient)
    Updates the information of an existing client in the database.

  • Method Details

    • getClients

      List<ClientDTO> getClients() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all clients from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of ClientDTO objects representing all clients in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • insertClient

      boolean insertClient(ClientDTO newClient) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new client into the database.
      Parameters:
      newClient - the ClientDTO object representing the new client to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the client was successfully inserted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteClient

      boolean deleteClient(ClientDTO deletedClient) throws SQLException
      Deletes a client from the database.
      Parameters:
      deletedClient - the ClientDTO object representing the client to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the client was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateClient

      boolean updateClient(ClientDTO updatedClient) throws SQLException
      Updates the information of an existing client in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedClient - the ClientDTO object representing the client with updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the client was successfully updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
